item.title: learn hugo
item.description: Introduction Basic usage hugo version hugo help hugo server --help hugo --buildDrafts # or -D hugo --buildExpired # or -E hugo --buildFuture # or -F hugo server --navigateToChanged Directory structure Configuration Merge configuration from themes The configuration value for _merge can be one of: none / shallow / deep
